SEARCH
Package main.java.views

Class TerminalRenderer

java.lang.Object
main.java.views.TerminalRenderer
public class TerminalRenderer extends Object
The TerminalRenderer class provides methods for rendering various components in a terminal interface, such as a welcome message, a menu, and displaying a map.

      menu_type - The type of the menu.
      options - The options to be displayed in the menu.

      Renders an error message.
      Parameters:
      error_string - The error message to be rendered.

      Renders the request for a map filename.
      Returns:
      The filename entered by the user.

      Renders the request for map editor commands.
      Returns:
      The command entered by the user.

      public static void showMap (boolean p_enable_gameview)
      Displays the map loaded in the game engine.
      Parameters:
      p_enable_gameview - Indicates whether to enable the game view (show player info).

    • issueOrderView

      public static String issueOrderView (String p_player)
      Renders the view for issuing orders by a player.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The name of the player issuing the order.
      Returns:
      The order entered by the player.

    • main

      public static void main (String[] args) throws FileNotFoundException
      The main method demonstrates the usage of the TerminalRenderer class by rendering a welcome message, rendering a sample menu, and displaying a map.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments (not used in this method).
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the map file is not found.
